themes: Need for in-person training on application and reporting
Partnership with Equity Office for training
Access issues with city-run art galleries
MACC gallery closure and lack of access before renovation
key_phrases: In person training sessions about how to apply and complete final reports
partner with Equity office to hold one
Better access to city run art galleries
fees at city venues should be on a sliding scale based on size of the organization's/artist's budget
barriers_identified: Lack of in-person training on application and reporting processes
Limited access to city-run art galleries
MACC gallery was always closed before renovation
Venue fees not scaled to organization or artist budget
solutions_proposed: Offer in-person training sessions about how to apply and complete final reports
Partner with Equity office to hold training
Provide better access to city-run art galleries
Implement sliding scale fees at city venues based on size of organization's/artist's budget
